page.title: 13GREAT MEOLS:FAMILY LIFE.
page.content: {The"PARRY"Family,(continued). } This Saturday we have got some rubbish to get rid of at the tip in West Kirby and some bottles to take to the bottle-bank where bottles are disposed of and collected for re-cycling. Then we came back via Hoylake, where we did some shopping.We needed some sandpaper,compost and some plant pots at the D.I.Y shop.When we got home my youngest brother went to play in his room and Mum and I re-planted some pot plants and herbs we had been growing from seed on our kitchen window.Then I took my golden labrador dog for a walk. I helped Dad in the afternoon as he was mending our side gates.The wood had rotted and he was replacing it and then painting it in creosote to protect it from the weather. {DAVID PARRY, AGE 10, GREAT MEOlS.
